description: Memory management tools for viewing and controlling memory storage

tools.name: trigger_summarization
tools.description: Manually trigger summarization of recent messages into compressed memory. Use this when you want to ensure important context is preserved before a natural break, or when explicitly asked to summarize.

force.description: Force summarization even if under threshold (default false)

tools.name: view_memory_chunks
tools.description: View your stored memory chunks for this conversation. Use this to understand what context you have access to, debug memory issues, or reflect on how your memory is organized.

limit.description: Maximum number of chunks to return (default 10)

tools.name: regenerate_working_summary
tools.description: Regenerate the working summary from existing memory chunks. Use this when the summary seems stale, inaccurate, or after significant context changes.
